texts.en: Pisa is a 49-year-old married woman with five children. She would like to start growing taro, bananas and taamu to earn a living. Pisa has requested a loan to buy some of the equipment and tools she needs to run her business. She has been a member of SPBD for one year. Pisa will spend her profits to support her family and to save for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, bush knives, chainsaw, weed sprayer and chemicals.

loans.name: Rasela

texts.en:
Rasela is 28 years old and married with three children. She has a small plantation where she grows taamu, yams, bananas and taro, which she sells in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for one year. 

Rasela needs a loan to buy chemicals, fertilizers, bush knives, a weed sprayer and a wheelbarrow. She has been a member of SBPD since March 2013. 

Rasela will use the profits from her sales to extend her business and to pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, fertilizers, bush knives, a weed sprayer and a wheelbarrow.

loans.name: Anarosa

texts.en:
Anarosa is 24 years old and married with three children. She wants to start a small business making and selling snacks, cooked noodles, donuts, etc. in her community. 

To do this, she needs a loan to buy all the goods and ingredients. 

In the future, Anarosa hopes to expand her food production sales. She joined SPBD in 2013 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy snacks, donuts, soft drinks, noodles, etc.

loans.name: Vevesi

texts.en:
Vevesi is 21 years old and single with no children. She runs a small business selling fish, octopus and sea cucumbers in her community. She has been doing this for more than two years.

Vevesi has requested a loan to buy a fishing boat, spears and fishing net. She joined SPBD this year to gain access to capital. 

Vevesi will use her earnings not only to improve her business but to also support her family.

loans.use: to buy a fishing boat, spears and fishing net.

loans.name: Tuusao

texts.en:
Tuusao is 66 years old and married with 9 children. She has a cattle farm and a small plantation where she grows taro, bananas, yams, and taamu that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for two years.

Tuusao needs a loan to buy chemicals, weed spray, a chainsaw, knives, and to pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, weed spray, a chainsaw, and knives for her business

loans.name: Delia

texts.en:
Delia is 34 years old and married with two children. She lives in Jiminez, Misamis Occidental. For the past four years, Delia has been a farmer who plants and harvests papaya to sell in the local community. She earns 3,000 PHP every month. Delia joined GDMPC this year to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. 

Delia is requesting a 5,000 PHP loan to purchase fertilizer such as manure. She plans to use the additional revenue generated with her loan to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure

loans.name: Sesili

texts.en:
Sesili is a 59-year-old married woman with six children. For over ten years, she has operated a huge plantation where she grows taro, yams, banana, and taamu to sell in her community. Sesili has been a member of SPBD since 2009.
 
Sesili is requesting a loan to buy new equipment such as a wheelbarrow, crowbar, spade, knives, rakes, and other tools for her farm. She plans to use the profits from her loan to support her family.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, crowbar, spade, knives, rakes, and other tools

loans.name: Jhona

texts.en:
Jhona is 30 years old and married with two children. She lives in Jiminez, Misamis Occidental. For the past three years, Jhona has owned and operated a motorcycle transport service. She earns 10,000 PHP every month and joined GDMPC in 2011. 

Jhona is requesting a 15,000 PHP loan to purchase spare parts and new tires. She plans to use the additional revenue generated with her loan to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts and new tires

loans.name: Pai

texts.en:
Pai is a 60-year-old married woman with seven children. For the past ten years, she has been managing a small plantation where she grows banana, taamu, and taro. Pai has been a member of SBPD since 2011.

Pai is requesting a loan to buy knapsack spray, chemicals, knives, spades, and a chainsaw. With her profits, she hopes to expand her business to better support her family.

loans.use: to buy knapsack spray, chemicals, knives, spades, and a chainsaw

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna is 48 years old and married with 11 children. She lives in Jiminez, Misamis Occidental. For the past eight years, Lorna has owned and operated a flower shop in her local community. She earns 1,700 PHP each month and joined GDMPC in 2010.

Lorna is requesting a 4,000 PHP loan to purchase chemicals for her flowers. She plans to use the additional revenue generated with her loan to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purshase chemicals for flowers

loans.name: Fiailoa

texts.en: Fiailoa is 64 years old and married with 10 children. She has a small garden where she grows cabbages and cucumbers that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for many years. Fiailoa needs a loan to purchase more chemicals and tools to expand her business. She has been a member of SBPD since 2010. Fiailoa will use the profits from her sales to save for her family's needs.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, shovels, a wheelbarrow, and other items.

loans.name: Ita

texts.en:
Ita is 52 years old and married with five children. 

She would like to start a small business of sewing clothes for a living. In order to do this, Ita needs a loan to buy a sewing machine, threads, nails and materials. 

She hopes to use her profits to support her family, pay her children's school fees and to save for unexpected emergencies. She has been a member of SPBD since 2013.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine, threads, nails and materials.

loans.name: Utagamamao

texts.en:
Utagamamao is a 42-year-old single woman with one child. 

She would like to start growing taamu, taro and banana to earn a living. 

Utagamamao has requested a loan to buy a wheelbarrow, weed sprayer, spade and bush knives. She has been a member of SPBD for one year.

Utagamamao will spend her profits to buy a truck for her delivery, and to save for her child's education.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, weed sprayer, spade and bush knives.

loans.name: Fonoia

texts.en:
Fonoia is a 43-year-old married woman with six children.

She has a small plantation and grows taro and taamu to earn a living. She has been doing this for three years. 

Fonoia has requested a loan to purchase more farming tools and chemicals to expand her business. She has been a member of SBPD since 2011. 

With her profits, Fonoia hopes to save for family needs.

loans.use: to buy bush knives, fertilizers, shovels and a wheel barrow.

loans.name: Marcela

texts.en:
Marcela is 56 years old, widowed, and has five children. She lives in Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. 

She plants and harvests vegetables and papaya to earn a living. She has been in her business for over six years and earns 3,000 PHP every month. 

She joined GDMPC in 2010, and now she has requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase chemicals for her garden. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase chemicals for her garden.

loans.name: Elmer

texts.en:
Elmer is 32 years old married. He has two children. He lives in Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. 

He owns and operates a transportation service in the local community to earn a living. He has been in his business for over four years and earns 8,000 PHP every month. 

He joined in GDMPC in 2010, and now he has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase spare parts for better service. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for better service.

loans.name: Librada

texts.en:
Librada is 56 years old, married, and has two children. She lives in Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. 

She plants and harvests bananas for sale to earn a living. She has been in her business for over eight years and earns 8,000 PHP every month. 

She joined GDMPC in 2010, and now she has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase chemicals for banana production. 

She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase chemicals for banana production.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
El señor Jorge está casado con la señora Mirian quien tiene  32 años ambos oriundos de la ciudad de Tobati, tienen 3 Hijos que aun dependen de ambos, que están estudiando.
El señor Jorge es plomero, es encargado de una Quinta y también fabrica latonas de cubiertas y de esa forma lucha y se esfuerza por poder dar a sus hijos lo que necesita, ya que no quiere que pasen por ninguna de las necesidades por lo que él ha pasado.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de herramientas para plomería, ya que quiere seguir dando un buen servicio a sus clientes, ya que esta es el único medio para seguir ayudando a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Jorge is married to Mirian, who is thirty-two years old.  Both of them are from the city of Tobati.  They have three children, all of whom are still their dependents and are studying in school.  

Jorge is a plumber, is in charge of a rural recreational area, and also makes brass roofing panels.  In this way, he fights and strives to be able to give his children what they need; he wants them to have all of the necessities that he had to live without.

He is requesting a loan to buy tools for plumbing.  He wants to continue offering a good service to his clients, and this is the only way for him to continue helping his customers.

loans.use: to buy plumbing tools to use in service to his clients.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es:
La señora Gladys tiene 22 años es de la ciudad de Villarrica, tiene una hija de 8 meses de edad. Está acompañada con el señor Torivio quien se dedica a la venta ambulante de todo tipo de productos.
Los 2 se ayudan mutuamente en las tareas ya que juntos están llevando adelante su nueva familia. Con mucho esfuerzo Gladys logró montar su propio negocio en su casa, el cual es una despensa, mientras su pareja recorre las compañías en su coche para poder vender sus productos, ella por su parte tiene una clientela variada y numerosa ya que es de muy buen trato, vende artículos de plásticos, golosinas y muchas cosas más.
Con el crédito que solicita Gladys quiere poder surtir su despensa con artículos de primera necesidad, como ser comestibles, bebidas, gaseosas y demás y de esa forma seguir con lo que viene haciendo hasta hoy.
texts.en: Gladys, who is 22 and comes from the city of Villarrica, has an eight-month-old daughter.  Her partner, Torivio, travels around selling a wide range of goods.  The two of them help each other with the household chores as they are both responsible for supporting their new family.  Gladys worked tremendously hard to set up her own business (a grocery shop) in her home whilst her partner goes round in his car selling his goods to businesses.  Gladys has a large and varied clientele because she offers very good service and sells plastic items, sweets and many other things.  The loan she is applying for will be used to stock her shop with basic necessities, such as foodstuffs, soft and fizzy drinks amongst other things, and will enable her to continue with what she has been doing so far.

loans.use: to buy foodstuffs, soft and fizzy drinks amongst other things.

loans.name: Blas

texts.es:
El Sr. Blas es de la ciudad de Santaní, es una persona soltera, que se define a sí mismo como una persona que quiere trabajar y salir adelante para poder ayudar a sus seres queridos.
El es dueño de un comedor pollería y parrillada, con buenísima ubicación, con clientela que siempre de forma habitual compran de él las comidas que vende, también es empleado de una institución pública,  y de esa forma está saliendo adelante.
Su sueño es construir piezas para hospedaje ya que llegan muchos vendedores ambulantes a su negocio, y ve muy buen potencial en su meta.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de bebidas con los que quiere poder surtir su comedor, y de esa forma seguir dando un buen servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Blas is from the city of Santaní and is single.  He describes himself as a person who wants to work in order to get ahead and to be able to help his loved ones.

He is the owner of a food store that sells chicken and barbecued meats.  It is located in a very good spot, and he has customers that always buy food from him.  He is also an employee of a public institution.  In this way, he is able to move ahead.

His dream is to build areas for lodging, since many traveling vendors come to his business; he sees a lot of potential in this goal.

He is requesting a loan in order to buy beverages so that he can stock his food store.  In this way, he will continue providing a good service to his customers.

loans.use: to buy beverages to stock his food store.

loans.name: Lanutausala

texts.en:
Lanutausala is a 39-year-old single woman. 

She has a small plantation and grows taro, banana and taamu to earn a living. She has been doing this for three years. 

Lanutausala has requested a loan to buy weed sprayer, chemicals, knives, spade, axe and fertilizer. She has been a member of SBPD since 2010. With her profits, Lanutausala hopes to support her family and to save for unexpected emergencies.

loans.use: to buy weed spray, chemicals, knives, spade, axe and fertilizers, etc.

loans.name: Merina

texts.en:
Merina is a 35-year-old married woman with one child.
 
She has a small plantation where she grows taros and bananas to earn a living. She has been doing this for four years. 

Merina has requested a loan to buy weed killer, weed sprayer, bush knives, etc.
 
She has been a member of SPBD since 2010. With her profits, Merina hopes to improve her plantation and her family living.

loans.use: to buy weed killer, weed sprayer, bush knives and a shovel.

loans.name: Poinciana

texts.en:
Poinciana is 27 years old and married. She has four children. 

She owns and operates a small store, selling items such as frozen products, snacks, drinks and a lot more. She has been doing this for five years.

Poinciana needs a loan to provide good quality items such as Coca Cola, Sprite, chicken legs, sausages, cooking oil, salt, sugar, flour and baking soda. 

She hopes to use her profits to give her family good support and also support her children in school. 

She became a member of SPBD in 2010 to gain access to capital for her business.

loans.use: to buy coca cola, sprite, chicken legs, sausages, cooking oil, salt, sugar, flour, baking soda.

loans.name: Suitala

texts.en:
Suitala is 45 years old and married with children. 

She runs a small business selling pancakes in her community and has been doing this for five years. 

Suitala has requested a loan to buy a bag of flour, a bag of sugar, baking powder, etc., needed for her business. 

She joined SPBD in 2009 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Suitala will save her money to renew her house and pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy a bag of flour, a bag of sugar, baking powder, etc.

loans.name: Maliana

texts.en: Maliana is 49 years old and married with six children. She has a small business, sewing and selling clothes within her community to earn a living. Maliana needs a loan to buy a new sewing machine and other useful tools for her business. She is planning to extend her business with her profit in the future. She has been a member of SPBD since 2012.

loans.use: to buy materials, a sewing machine, needles, threads and scissors.

loans.name: Filo

texts.en: Filo is 52 years old and married with seven children. She wants to start a small business making and selling snacks, cooked noddles, donuts, etc., in her community. To do this, she needs a loan to buy all the goods and ingredients. In the future, Filo hopes to expand her canteen. She joined SPBD in 2013 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and goods for making and selling snacks, donuts, noodles, soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: Imeleta

texts.en: Imeleta is a 40-year-old married woman with six children. She has two old lawn mowers that she uses to earn money to support her family. Imeleta has been in the SPBD for three years and her family has been improving rapidly.

loans.use: to buy new lawn mowers.

loans.name: Talita

texts.en: Talita is a 29-year-old single woman with one child. She would like to start growing taro, taamu, yams and bananas to earn a living. Talita has requested a loan to buy weed spray, chemicals, knives, a spade, an axe and fertilizer for her plantation. Talita will spend her profits to extend her business.

loans.use: to buy weed spray, chemicals, knives, a spade, an axe and fertilizer.

loans.name: Tuileva

texts.en: Tuileva  is 26 years old and married with 4 children. She owns and operates her sewing business at a local flea market. She has 3 years of experience in this line of business. Tuileva needs a loan to buy fabric and other traditional patterns to make more clothes for her business. She hopes to use her profits to improve her business and to be able to support her family financially. She joined SPBD this year.

loans.use: new fabric materials and patterns

loans.name: Kuña Guapa Group

texts.es:
17 son las mujeres que integran este grupo de la ciudad de Asunción. Gracias a que todas trabajan por salir adelante ya están en su ciclo numero 19. Ellas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, que les ayuda a saber cuál es el ingreso de cada una.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Cecilia quien gracias al trabajo que está haciendo pudo mejorar bastante su economía y así ayuda a su familia. Entre el trabajo que ella hace se dedica a la venta de comestibles de todo tipo, y en lo cual le va muy bien ya que sus comidas son muy ricas y solicitadas por sus clientes. La meta de Cecilia es seguir trabajando y ayudando a su familia como lo viene haciendo, y también mejorar su economía.
La Sra. Solicita de este crédito para la compra de los ingredientes para la elaboración de los comestibles, como ser carne, verduras, condimentos, huevos, harina, etc. lo que le ayudará a tener a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
There are 17 members in this group in the city of Asunción.  Thanks to everybody's work to move forward in life, the group is now on its nineteenth cycle.  They are currently undergoing the poverty elimination survey in order to establish how much each person has as an income.

One of the group's members is Cecilia who, thanks to her work, has been able to improve her financial situation vastly and thus help her family.  One way she makes a living is selling different types of foods.  This is going very well for her as her dishes are delicious and sought after by her customers.  Cecilia's goal is to continue working and helping her family as she has been doing, as well as to improve her financial situation.

Cecilia is applying for this loan to buy the ingredients to prepare her dishes, such as meat, vegetables, condiments, eggs, flour and more.  This will help her to realise her business plan and thus improve her income.

loans.use: to buy meat, vegetables, condiments, eggs, flour and more.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El cliente vive en Guayaquil. Empezó en el suburbio vendiendo alitas y chusos, cuando el Gobierno decidio reubicarlos ellos tuvieron que salir de donde vivian y comenzar una nueva vida en otro lugar. Fue entonces cuando omenzaron a vender cosméticos, perfumes, cremas. 

El trabaja con su esposa  de 10h00 a 18h00 vende cosméticos perfumes de hombre y mujer, cadenas etc.
Su dificultas es su salud a veces no le permite trabajar normalmente ya que es pvvs (paciente viviendo con vih sida). Si tiene esposa ella vende tambien cosméticos. Tiene un hijo de 21 años.  

Con el prestamo quiere comprar cosmeticos e instalar un negocio nuevo de alitas de pollo donde vive en la actualidad. Su sueño es poder disfrutar junto a su familia poder ponerse un frigorífico en la casa y si es posible comprarse un auto.
texts.en:
The client lives in Guayaquil.  He started in the suburbs selling wings and kebabs.  When the government decided to relocate them, they had to leave where they lived and begin a new life in another place.  That is when they started to sell cosmetics, perfumes, and creams.

He works with his wife from 10:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m.  He sells cosmetics, men’s and women’s perfume, and chains, etc.

His difficulty is his health.  At times it does not allow him to work normally because he is a PVVS (patient living with HIV/AIDS).  He does have a wife, and she also sells cosmetics.  He has a 21 year old son.

He wants to use the loan to buy cosmetics.  He also wants to use the loan to set up a new chicken wings business where he is currently living.

His dream is to be able to enjoy being together with his family, to be able to put a refrigerator in his house, and, if possible, to buy a car.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and to set up a new chicken wings business.

loans.name: Virgen De Fatima Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Virgen de Fatima está en su ciclo número 13 donde gracias al trabajo que cada una están llevando adelante su grupo. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, el cual les ayudará a saber cuál es el ingreso que cada una hace, donde tres integrantes se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, es decir con un ingreso muy escaso.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Maria, quien en su encuesta se pudo ver que tiene ingresos por debajo del mínimo. Ella cuenta que vende comestibles, como ser empanadas, sándwiches, croquetas y demás,  y es con esto que tiene los medios para poder ayudar a su familia. Ella es una persona que se esmera día con día
, ya que quiere mejorar sus ingresos, para poder dar a su familia lo que ella no pudo tener.
Solicita este crédito ya que quiere comprar harina, huevos, leche, condimentos, carne y demás insumos para poder seguir haciendo los comestibles que vende, y así seguir deleitando a sus clientes y generando los ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
This group, called "Virgen de Fatima" is on its thirteenth loan cycle and, thanks to everyone's hard work, they are all moving forward.  They are currently undergoing the poverty elimination survey which will help to identify each member's income.  Three of the group's members live under the poverty line, meaning that they have a very, very low income.

One of the group's members in María whose survey showed her to be living under the poverty live.  She tells us that she sells snack foods, like empanadas (pastries with either a meat or sweet filling), sandwiches, croquettes and more.  Through this work she can help her family.  María does her best every day as she wants to improve her income so as to help give her family what she herself could not have. 

María is applying for this loan as she wants to buy flour, eggs, milk, condiments, meat and other supplies so as to be able to continue making the foodstuffs that she sells and thus continue pleasing her customers and generating an income for her family.

loans.use: to buy flour, eggs, milk, condiments, meat and other supplies.

loans.name: Al

texts.en:
Al is 41 years old and married with two children. He lives in Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. He owns and operates an agriculture project, which is a garden. He is planting and harvesting vegetables and bananas for sale to earn a living. He has been in his business for over four years and earns 8,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) every month.

He joined GDMPC in the year 2010, and now he has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer such as manure for the garden. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure for the garden.

loans.name: Ariana Maria

texts.es: Ariana, de 32 años de edad casada su esposo se dedica a la venta de madera, ella tiene su propio negocio el alquiler de sillas, mesas y discomóvil, amenizando fiestas de cumpleaños, bodas, quince años y bautizos, con este crédito desea invertir comprando 75 sillas plásticas, para reforzar un poco más el negocio y así obtener más ganancias y ayudar a su hijo quien está estudiando que con muchos esfuerzos obtiene para pagar la colegiatura, ya que muchas veces esta baja la temporada de eventos. Pero aun asi Ariana no pierde las esperanzas deque en un futuro pueda tener un restaurante con discoteque, por eso simepre esta dispuesta al trabajo para crecer poco a poco.
texts.en:
Ariana, 32, is married.  Her husband sells wood.  She has her own business renting tables, chairs, and a mobile disco service, livening up birthday parties, weddings, "quinceañeras" [fifteenth-birthday celebrations for girls], and baptisms.

She wants to buy 75 plastic chairs with this loan to strengthen her business a bit more so she can earn more profit to help her son, who attends school.  With a lot of effort she earns money to pay for his school expenses, because often it's the low season for events.

Even so, Ariana doesn't lose hope because in the future she wants to have a restaurant with a disco.  This is why she's always willing to work to grow little by little.

loans.use: to buy 75 plastic chairs to rent

loans.name: Gustave

texts.fr: gustave est une homme de 31 ans, célibataire et père de 3 enfants. Il possède et gère un kiosque de vente de chaussures dans un quartier de la ville depuis 10 ans. ce crédit va lui permettre de renforcer son stock de marchandises en achetant des babouches, sandales etc afin d'augmenter son chiffre d'affaires et ses profits. Les bénéfices générés vont être injectés dans son activité pour accroître son capital et ouvrir un nouveau point de vente d'une part et vont lui permettre de financer les études de ses enfants.
texts.en: Gustave is a 31-year old man, unmarried and the father of three. He owns and manages a sales stand and has been selling shows for over 10 years. This loan will allow him to build up his merchandise stock by buying slippers, sandals etc in order to increase his sales volume and his profits. The resulting profits will be reinvested in his business in order to grow his capital and eventually open a new sales stand, which will allow Gustave to finance his children’s studies.

loans.use: to stock up on merchandise.

loans.name: Lourdes Consuelo

texts.es:
Lourdes es una mujer de 22 años, creció en una familia de escasos recursos por lo que alcanzó a aprobar la escuela primaria. Trabajó desde muy joven ayudando en su casa y aprendió varias labores con las que se defiende hasta la actualidad. Es soltera y tiene un hijo de 2 años quien se ha convertido en la razón para seguir adelante sin dejarse derivar por los obstáculos. Vive con su hijo y su hermana Rosa, quien trabaja como empleada privada, en la ciudad de Atuntaqui de la provincia de Imbabura en  el norte del Ecuador.  Un lugar que goza de muchos lugares históricos que ofrecer a quienes le visitan además de una deliciosa gastronomía que es la favorita de  muchos en el país. Otra actividad que es muy conocida en este cantón es la textil, pues el diseño de ropa industrial y artesanal se ha convertido en una actividad que aporta al crecimiento sostenido de la ciudad por lo que las prendas elaboradas son preferidas por su diferente calidad y diseños a nivel nacional e internacional. Cuenta con un clima agradable que es seco y templado lo que ayuda mantener sus tierras fértiles y por lo tanto aptas para el cultivo de cereales y legumbres. Por todas estas oportunidades existentes en la ciudad, Atuntaqui es considerado un centro productivo importante para el Ecuador, mérito que no fuese posible sin la fuerza y espíritu emprendedor de sus habitantes que a la vez generan plazas de trabajo para las familias de la Provincia.
Lourdes hace un año emprendió con su negocio de venta de “salchipapas” una comida rápida que tiene papas y salchichas fritas y que son muy demandadas por jóvenes y adultos. Actividad que aprendió de algunos familiares y a la cual le dedica 6 horas cada día y luego de asear los utensilios y el pequeño local, empieza la comercialización de frutas y verduras al por menor. Lourdes espera que un día pueda ampliar su local y convertirlo en un restaurante al cual acudan varios clientes a degustar su sazón. Ella ha solicitado un préstamo con el cual empezará a hacer algunos arreglos al local y así hacerlo más atractivo a la vista de los clientes. Además comprará algunas herramientas y utensilios que faciliten su trabajo, de esta forma podrá dedicar más tiempo a su hijo y obtener utilidades que le ofrezcan un mejor estilo de vida. Lourdes agradece a quienes a través del portal de Kiva apoyan esta causa y han creído en emprendedores como ella. Cuando a Lourdes le preguntamos porque obtuvo el préstamo en Fundación Alternativa, ella respondió que se siente muy satisfecha con la facilidad, agilidad, confianza y asesoría personalizada que allí le brindaron.
texts.en:
Lourdes, 22, grew up in a low-income family so she finished elementary school.  She started working at a very young age helping at home, and learned several jobs that she currently gets by on.  She's single and has a two-year-old son who has become her reason to get ahead without allowing herself to be distracted by obstacles.  She lives with her sister Rosa, who works as a private employee, in the city of Atuntaqui in the province of Imbabura in the north of Ecuador.

Atuntaqui is a place with a lot of historical sites for those who visit as well as a delicious cuisine that's the favorite of many people in the country.  Another well-known activity in the canton is textiles, because industrial and artisanal clothing design has become an industry that contributes sustained growth to the city.  The garments made there are preferred nationally and internationally for their different quality and designs.  The dry and temperate climate is agreeable, which helps keep the land fertile and appropriate for growing grains and vegetables.  With all these opportunities in Atuntaqui, the city is considered an important center of production in Ecuador, something that wouldn't be possible without the strength and enterprising spirit of the residents, who also generate jobs for families in the province.

Lourdes started her business a year ago.  She sells "salchipapas," a fast food of fried potatoes and sausages that's very popular with young people and adults.  She learned the job from some relatives and devotes six hours every day to it.  After she cleans her utensils and her small space, she begins to sell fruits and vegetables retail.

Lourdes hopes to expand her space someday and convert it into a restaurant for customers who enjoy her flavors.  She has requested a loan to begin to make some repairs to her locale and make it more attractive for her customers.  She'll also buy some tools and utensils to facilitate her work.  This way she'll be able to dedicate more time to her child and earn profits that will give her a better lifestyle.

Lourdes is grateful to those who support her cause through Kiva and have believed in entrepreneurs such as herself.  When asked why she got the loan from Fundación Alternativa she said she's very satisfied with the ease, flexibility, trust, and personal counseling they gave her there.

loans.use: to expand her business into a restaurant

loans.name: Virgen De Fatima Group

texts.es:
Virgen de Fatima está en su ciclo número 6º del programa de comité de mujeres, donde están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, el cual les ayuda a saber la situación económica de las integrantes y que ha mostrado que  6 integrantes se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, con ingresos muy bajos.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Dora, quien a través de la venta de lencería está saliendo adelante. Siempre tiene prendas muy lindas y baratas, y eso atrae mucho a sus clientes. Con los ingresos que tiene ayuda a su familia y les da todo para que no les falte nada. Es una persona muy entusiasta y con metas a cumplir.
Solicita de este crédito para poder comprar lencería para la venta, ya que tiene pedidos con los que le gustaría poder cumplir. Con esto podrá aumentar sus ingresos y seguir ayudando a su familia.
texts.en:
”Virgen de Fátima” is in its sixth cycle of the women committee program. Its members have participated in the poverty elimination survey, which provides information about their situation. Six members were found to be living below the poverty line, receiving a very low income.

One of the group's members is Mrs. Dora, who is getting ahead by selling lingerie. She always has cheap and beautiful garments, which helps her attract customers. With her income, she helps her family and gives them all they need. She is an enthusiastic person that has set some goals she wants to meet. 

Dora is requesting a loan to buy lingerie, since she has some orders to fulfill. This will result in a better income to continue helping her family.

loans.use: to buy lingerie to sell.

loans.name: Kossivi

texts.fr: Âgé de 29ans, Kossivi est revendeur d’appareils électroniques depuis 2009. Il s’approvisionne au Port Autonome de Lomé et revend dans une boutique. Son second crédit lui permettra de s’approvisionner en marchandises (appareils électroniques). A l’avenir, il veut devenir grossiste et aider ses frères dans leurs études.
texts.en:
29-year-old Kossivi is an electronic equipment dealer since 2009. He resupplies at the Autonomous Port of Lomé and resells in a shop.

This second loan will enable him to stock up with merchandise (electronic equipment). In the future, he wants to become a wholesaler and help his brothers pursue their studies.

loans.use: Buy electronic equipment

loans.name: Garamhand

texts.en: Mrs. Garamhand is 32 years old and lives with her husband and three children in a Ger in the Bayanhoshuu area of Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. Her husband Anhbayar, age 31, runs a taxi service business in town. Her daughter Myagmarsuren, age 13, and sons Azjargal, age 9, and Elbegbayar, age 5, go to local schools and kindergarten. The borrower has been working at local cafeteria since 2010. Her family moved to the city one and half years ago. Her husband's car has been broken for while and they needed 1,500,000 MNT to fix the car and purchase spare parts in order to provide the taxi service business smoothly with no pause. Both the borrower and her husband are hardworking people.

loans.use: to fix the car and purchase spare parts in order to provide the taxi service business smoothly with no pause

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia is 55 years old and has six children. She is married and has one child who is in school.

Alicia is in the agricultural business, pig-fattening in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 20,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. to buy feed and piglets for her business.

Alicia has been in pig-fattening for six years now, and has borrowed 13 times in the past from Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. to sustain the business. Alicia would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and piglets for her business.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is 51 years old, married, with four children. She lives in Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. 

To earn a living, she owns and operates a business, raising pigs for sale. She has been in her business for over six years and earns PHP 4,000 every month. 

She joined Gata Daku Multi-Purpose Cooperative (GDMPC) in 2010 and now she has requested a loan of PHP 7,000 to purchase feed for pigs. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase feed for pigs.

loans.name: Virgen De Los Dolores Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Virgen de los Dolores; está en su ciclo número  1 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están empezando a trabajar juntas y tienen todas las ganas de mejorar sus vidas por medio de ese esfuerzo.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Myrian, quien a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y las aplicaciones de los comportamientos vitales de una mujer exitosa, ella se encuentra mejorando su vida, ella se dedica a las ventas, tiene una pequeña pero surtida despensa, en la cual trabaja todos los días desde muy tempranas horas. Cuenta que su sueño es poder tener una gran tienda y de ese modo poder seguir dando una buena comodidad a su clientes.
La Sra. Solicita de este crédito para la compra de leche, panificados, harina, aceite entre otros productos más vendidos; lo que le ayudará a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The group named Virgen de los Dolores is in its first cycle of the women's committee program where they all work and help each other get ahead. They are beginning to work together and they all have the desire to improve their lives through this effort.

One of the members is Myrian who through hard and continuous work and the application of vital behavior has become a successful woman. She is improving her life. She is dedicated to sales. She has a small but well-stocked shop  in which she works every day from the very early hours. She says that her dream is to be able to have a big store and, in this way, be able to keep giving good comfort to her customers.

She is requesting this loan to buy milk, baked goods, flour, oil, among other products sold more; What will help her nail down her business plan which will help her improve her income.

loans.use: to buy milk, baked good, flour, oil, among other items.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
Francisca tiene 51 años, es de la ciudad de Paraguarí está acompañada con Ygnacio quien es electricista, viven en casa propia, tienen 2  hijos, quienes ya son mayores de edad, profesionales e independientes.
Ella tiene una despensa desde hace más de 2 años, en lo que le está yendo muy bien, pues cuenta  que tiene una clientela formada gracias a la excelente atención, además de ser la única despensa más surtida del barrio, y es por la suma de todo esto que le va muy bien. Ella sueña con poder seguir creciendo para tener así los ingresos necesarios para ayudar a su marido con los gastos de la casa.
Solicitó el préstamo para la compra de bebidas, azúcar, arroz, harina y otros productos en general, que son los que más salida tienen. Agradece por la ayuda que está recibiendo, que le será muy útil.
texts.en:
Francisca is 51 years old, and is from the city of Paraguarí. She lives with her partner, Ygnacio, who is an electrician. They live in their own home, and have two children, who are already grown-up, have jobs, and are independent.
Ella has ran a store for over two years, which is going very well, because she says that she has a loyal customer base thanks to her excellent service, in addition to being the best-stocked store in the neighborhood. This combination of factors means that she is enjoying lots of success.

She dreams of being able to continue to grow, so that she earns enough to help her husband with the household expenses. She is requesting this loan to buy drinks, sugar, rice, flour and other items, as these are the best-selling products. She is grateful for the help she is receiving, it will be very useful.

loans.use: to buy drinks, sugar, rice, flour and other general items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Concepción

texts.es:
La Señora Concepción, labora como docente en un  colegio de la ciudad de león desde hace 26 años dando el pan del saber a sus alumnos realiza esta labor de lunes a viernes con horario 1:00 pm  y finaliza a las 5:20 pm.  Ella  hace este tipo de trabajo para la mantención de su familia. 

La Señora Concepción se acercó a Ceprodel a solicitar un  crédito  para sufragar gastos medico de su hijo, como es la elaboración de exámenes, consultas médicas y medicamento.  

Cabe mencionar que la señora espera la recuperación pronta de su lindo hijo.
texts.en:
Concepción has worked as a teacher at a school in the city of Leon for 26 years, giving the gift of knowledge to her students. She works from Monday to Friday, starting at 1:00pm and finishing at 5:20pm. She does this sort of work to support her family.

Concepción approached CEPRODEL to request a loan in order to cover her son’s medical expenses, such as examinations, consultations, and medicine.

It is appropriate to mention that Concepción is hoping for a speedy recovery for her lovely son.

loans.use: to cover personal medical expenses

loans.name: Pedro José

texts.es:
El señor Pedro José, es  padre  de dos  hijos y se desempeña como profesor docente de un colegio de la ciudad de león desde hace 28 años dando el pan del saber a sus alumnos realiza esta labor de lunes a viernes con horario 7:00 am  y finaliza a las 1:00 pm.   El  hace este tipo de trabajo para llevar  el sustento de su familia.

Don Pedro solicita este crédito para compra de material de construcción tales como arena, cemento, hierro,  para realizar mejoras en su humilde vivienda ya que se aproxima la temporada de invierno y así tener un mejor nivel de vida de ella y sus dos hijos.
texts.en:
Pedro José has two children and has worked as a teacher in a school in the city of León for 28 years. He works Monday through Friday from 7am to 1pm. Thanks to his job, he can financially support his family. 

Don Pedro is requesting a loan to buy construction materials such as sand, cement and iron. He wants to make improvements to his modest home because the winter season is getting closer and he wants to provide his two children with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement and iron.

loans.name: Clarita

texts.en:
Clarita is 56 years old, single, and has one child.  She lives in Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. Clarita has a retail shop that sells the basic needs, such as canned goods, noodles, shampoo, toothpaste, spices, salt, milk, sugar, soft drinks, juices, and more. She has operated her store for 12 years, earning an income of 4,000 PHP every month. 

Clarita is requesting a loan from GDMPC for 6,000 PHP, which she will use to purchase new items to expand her product offering. She has been a member of GDMPC since 2008. In the future, Clarita hopes to expand and improve her product offerings to earn more income.

loans.use: to purchase new items to expand product offering

loans.name: Luz Elena

texts.es:
Luz Elena, se ha caracterizado por ser una mujer luchadora y esforzada. Nació en el campo y vivió allí hasta hace 17 años que se radicó en la ciudad de Medellín. En búsqueda de mejores oportunidades de vida, Luz aprendió el oficio de la confección y se dedicó a esta actividad después de  la muerte de su esposo con el fin de garantizarle a su hijo una vivienda digna y una buena educación. 
En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de una máquina fileteadora e insumos (telas) con el fin de realizar la producción solicitada por una empresa de la ciudad. 
Desea aumentar sus ingresos y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Luz Elena is characterized as being a fighting and hard working woman. She was born in the countryside and live there until she was 17 years old when she moved to the city of Medellin. In search of better opportunities for life, Luz learned the trade of tailoring and has been dedicated to this activity since the death of her husband with the goal of guaranteeing a dignified home and a good education for her son.

Currently she is requesting a loan that will be invested in the purchase of an overlock sewing machine and resources (thread) with the aim to complete the requested production for a company in the city.

She wishes to expand her income and improve the quality of life of her family.

loans.use: to buy an overlock sewing machine and resources (thread).

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 52 years old. She is from the village of Calabayan Minanga. Erlinda is single, which is why she devotes herself to selling used clothes. She has been in this business for almost seven years. 

Erlinda needs additional funds for her business. That is why she is asking for a loan in the amount of PHP 20,000 to buy more used clothes and bags to sell. Erlinda hopes that she can obtain her desired loan to further improve her business.

loans.use: to buy more used clothes and bags to sell.

loans.name: Jovenal

texts.en:
Jovenal is 40 years old, married, and has two children. He lives in Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. He raises chickens to sell, which he has been doing for over five years.  He earns 4,000 PHP every month. 

Jovenal is requesting a loan from GDMPC, which he joined in 2011, for 7,000 PHP, which he will use to purchase feeds for his chickens. He plans to use the additional revenue to improve and expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase feeds for his chickens

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy lives in Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She earns a living by providing transportation services. She has been doing this for five years, so as to support the needs of her four children. She earns an income of PHP 2,000 a month from this business. 

For a 34-year-old mother, there is nothing that can make her more happy than to see her children successful in their studies. Without hesitation, Lucy is borrowing an amount of PHP 5,000 from Gata Daku Multi-Purpose Cooperative (GDMPC) to repair her transport vehicle that she uses in her business and to provide her children a better education. Her plan in the future is to hopefully improve her business.

loans.use: to repair her transport vehicle used in her business.

loans.name: Evaristo

texts.es:
Sr. Evaristo es casado y tiene cinco hijos dos varones y tres mujeres que están en etapa escolar, vive en la casa propia donde cuenta con un ambiente y se encuentra el dormitorio y no cuenta con  cocina, ni baño, la  habitación es de adobe y el piso de tierra, no tiene tumbado solo techo de calamina, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona Coripata sector Trinidad Pampa de Los Yungas de La Paz.
Actualmente trabaja en el  cultivo de hortalizas, frutos en forma rudimentaria men un terreno de pertenencia y la esposa también trabaja en el cultivo frutas y limpiando las chacras, sus productos los comercializa por la misma zona donde vive  y en la ciudad de La Paz; el lugar de trabajo es un lugar lleno de tierra y polvo, ellos trabajan todos los días de la semana, ambos  colaboran en el pago de los servicios, comida y vestimenta, y educación de sus hijos.
El crédito lo requiere para Invertir en semilla y tener mejor producción teniendo cuidado de que sea una producción más limpia. El sueño de Evaristo es poder contar con capital de trabajo, y herramientas que le facilita a mejorar su producción y así  mejorar su calidad de vida.
Es la primera vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO Y KIVA.
texts.en:
Evaristo is married and has 5 school-age children (2 boys and 3 girls).  He lives in his own home which has a living room and a bedroom but no kitchen or bathroom.  The living room is made of adobe and has a dirt floor but no ceiling - just a corrugated iron roof.  The house is in the Coripata district of the Trinidad Pampa de los Yungas canton in La Paz. 

At the moment his work involves growing vegetables and fruit, in a rudimentary fashion, on a plot of land which he owns.  His wife also grows fruit and cleans farms.  He sells his produce in the area where he lives and in an area full of dirt and dust in the city of La Paz.  He and his wife work seven days a week and both contribute to the household expenses: utility bills, food and clothing, and their children's schooling.  The loan he is applying for will be used to buy seeds and to boost his level of production, whilst ensuring that this is done in a cleaner way. Evaristo's dream is to have working capital and some tools to enable him to boost his level of production and thereby improve his quality of life.  This is the first time that he has applied for a loan with IMPRO and KIVA.

loans.use: to buy seeds to boost his vegetable and fruit production

loans.name: Miguelon

texts.es:
Miguelon es casado y tiene dos hijos dos varones que están en etapa escolar, vive en la casa propia donde cuenta con un ambiente y se encuentra el dormitorio y no cuenta con  cocina, la  habitación es de adobe y el piso de tierra, no tiene tumbado solo techo, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona Coripata sector Trinidad Pampa de Los Yungas de La Paz.
Actualmente trabaja en el  cultivo de hortalizas en forma rudimentaria y la esposa también trabaja en el cultivo de hortalizas y desyerbado y limpiando las chacras, sus productos los comercializa por la misma zona donde vive  y en la ciudad de La Paz; el lugar de trabajo es un lugar lleno de tierra y polvo, ellos trabajan todos los días de la semana, ambos  colaboran en el pago de los servicios, comida y vestimenta, y educación de sus hijos.
El crédito lo requiere para la compra de una motocicleta que le ayudará a movilizar a su familia tanto para ir a la escuela de sus hijos y para ir a su terreno donde trabaja y está lleno de tierra y polvo.
El sueño de Miguelon es poder contar con capital de trabajo que le facilita a mejorar su producción y así  mejorar su calidad de vida.
Es la primera vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO Y KIVA.
texts.en:
Miguelon is married and has 2 sons, both of school age. He lives in his own house little protected from the ambience, with a bedroom but no kitchen. The house is built of adobe and the floor is packed earth. it lacks some walls but has a roof. The house is located in Coripata zone, in the Trinidad Pampa sector of Las Yungas in La Paz.

At present, he cultivates vegetables in a rudimentary way and his wife also works, cultivating vegetables and herbs, and clearing small farms. They sell their products in the zone where they live and in the city of La Paz. The place where they work is replete with dirt and dust. They work every day of the week. Both collaborate in paying for the services, food, clothing, and education of their sons. 

He needs the loan to purchase a motorcycle to help transport his family, for his sons to go to school and for him to go to his fields where he works amidst the dirt and dust.

Miguelon's dream is to be able to count on enough working capital to facilitate improved production and, thus, improving his quality of life.

This is the 1st loan he has solicited from IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle to serve as transportation to reach his sons' school and the fields where he cultivates vegetables.

loans.name: Gulmurod

texts.ru: Гулмуроду 45 лет. У него жена и трое детей. Он со своей семьей проживает в Яванском районе. У Гулмурод высшее образование. Последние 6 лет Гулмурод занимается животноводством. Он покупает крупнорогатый скот, откармливает в течение месяца и затем продает с наценкой на скотном рынке. Ему помогает семья. За счет прибыли с продажи он обеспечивает свою семью. Гулмурод просит кредит для купли и продажи крупно-рогатого скота. В дальнейшем он планирует увеличить поголовье скота.
texts.en: Gulmurod is 45 years old. He has a wife and three children. He lives with his family in the Yavan region. Gulmurod has high education. For the last six years Gulmurod has been doing animal husbandry. He buys large horned cattle, feeds it for a few months and then resells with a markup on the cattle market. His family is helping him in this business. He provides for his family using the profit from the sales. Gulmurod is asking for a loan to buy and resell large horned cattle. In the future he wants to increase the headcount of cattle.

loans.use: to buy and resell large horned cattle.

loans.name: Glaiza

texts.en:
Glaiza is 24 years old. She lives in Jimenez, Misamis Occidental with her partner and one child. She owns and operates a fish vending business in the local community to earn a living. She has run her business for over 4 years and earns 5,000 PHP every month. 

Glaiza has been a member of GDMPC since the year 2011. Now she has requested a loan of 8,000 PHP to purchase fishing materials such as nets and hooks. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fishing materials such as nets and hooks

loans.name: Rubylyn

texts.en:
This is Rubylyn. Her previous loan was a big help in her business. She was able to buy all the needed grocery items for her variety store. The loan also helped in her household and her children's education. She has been running this business for just a year and it continues to grow. She and her husband are working hard to earn income to meet their everyday needs.

She would like to apply for another 15,000 PHP loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add to her inventory. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items to sell will result in better profit. Her profits from the business will definitely help sustain her family’s daily needs and her children’s education expenses. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Rubylyn hopes that her business will continue to grow and dreams that her children will finish their studies. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members every week to share stories of her life and business and to draw strength and inspiration from studying the Word of God.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items and other products needed in her business.

loans.name: Yecid

texts.es: El Sr. Yecid  tiene 32 años,  el se dedica a la  venta de juguetes de segunda mano en su puesto de venta que se encuentra en la populosa feria de la 16 de julio de la ciudad de  El Alto,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, el Sr. Yecid  va a usar este préstamo para compra de juguetes por mayor para surtir su  negocio,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es crecimiento de su negocio, el Sr. Yecid  enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia ya que en la mismo mercado donde vende existen varias personas que se dedican a la misma actividad, va a utilizar los beneficios para mejorar sus productos y su calidad de vida. Su deseo  para su negocio es montar una tienda propia y poder exponer la variedad de juguetes que tiene para la venta.
texts.en: Yecid, who is 32, sells second-hand toys on his stall in the busy Avenida 16 de Julio market in the city of El Alto.  This will be Yecid's first loan with the institution and he plans to use it to buy toys in bulk to stock his stall.  His reason for seeking the loan is to develop his business.  Yecid's major challenge is competition, as there are already a number of other people running identical businesses in the same market.  He will use the loan to improve his goods and his quality of life.  His dream is to set up his own shop and to extend the range of toys on sale.

loans.use: to buy second-hand toys

loans.name: Mardy

texts.en:
Mardy is a married woman with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Mardy is 44 years old and four of her children are in school.

Mardy has a business of buying and selling dressed chickens and frozen foods in the Philippines. Mardy requested a loan of 13,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy additional dressed chickens and frozen foods for her business.

Mardy has been in this business for 11 years. In the future, Mardy would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional dressed chickens and frozen foods for her business.

loans.name: Flor

texts.en:
Flor is 29 years old and married with two children. She lives in Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She owns and operates an agriculture business, planting and harvesting vegetables which she sells to earn a living. She has operated her business for over three years and earns 5,000 PHP every month. 

Flor has been a member of GDMPC since the year 2011. Now she has requested a loan of 8,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer such as manure. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure

loans.name: Carmen Pastora

texts.es: Doña Carmen, mujer emprendedora continua siempre adelante con su negocio de gimnasio y a la vez alquila cuartos, labor que le permite cuidar más de cerca a sus pequeños hijos quienes van a la escuela, cuenta también con el apoyo de su esposo quien trabaja como conductor, así trabajan a diario doña Carmen y su esposo, este crédito que solicita es para poner puertas de madre, cerámica para seguir acondicionando el gimnasio, gracias a las ganancias obtenidas podrá hacer estas mejoras para dar una buena imagen, obtener mejores ingresos y ayudar  más a su familia.
texts.en:
Doña Carmen is an enterprising woman who continues to manage her business of running a gymnasium while offering rooms for rent. This enables her to look after her school-age children since she is much closer to them. Carmen also has the support of her husband who works as a driver. She and her husband work every day.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy wooden doors and ceramic tiles so that she can continue adding finishing touches to her gymnasium. Thanks to the profits she has generated, she will be able to make these improvements that will give her business a nice appearance. As a result, she will generate better earnings and be able to help her family even more.

loans.use: to buy doors, ceramic tiles, and cement in order to complete her gym.

loans.name: Socorro

texts.en:
Socorro is a 67-years-old widow with four children.

Socorro works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell like rice, soft drinks, canned goods and other groceries for her general store.

Socorro has borrowed and paid 14 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for eight years and also earns additional income from house and videoke machine rental.

Socorro aspires to an improved standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell like rice, soft drinks, canned goods and other groceries for her general store

loans.name: Ma. Lourdes

texts.en:
Ma. Lourdes is engaged in a hog-raising business in the village of Centro 2, San Guillermo. She is 41 years old, and she and her spouse were blessed with two children. Ma. Lourdes is widowed, and that's why she works hard to support their daily needs and to help her children financially. 

Ma. Lourdes wants to develop her business and increase her income. To this end, she wants to borrow PHP 10,000 to buy feed and vaccines for her hog. She is hoping that her loan request will be granted so the she can develop her business and purchase more hogs to raise.

loans.use: to buy feed and vaccines for her hog

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
Wilma is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fish vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 14000 through NWTF to buy additional boxes of fish to sell for her fish vending business.

Wilma has been in this business for three years. Wilma earns more income from hog raising and direct selling of Avon and personal collection products.

Wilma has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money so she could afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Evelia Francisca

texts.es: Doña Evelia  es una humilde comerciante, de 42 años de edad, es cliente Kiva, es dueña de una pulpería, ella está muy agradecida por su primer préstamo porque le ha sido de gran ayuda ya que pudo invertirlo en su negocio comprando más frutas, verduras y granos básicos, de esta manera ha podido incrementar sus ganancias, es por eso que hoy día está solicitando su segundo préstamo para comprar gaseosa, azúcar, arroz, frijoles, aceite, carne, pollo, piña, melón, jabón, etc.  Con el propósito de agregar más productos a su pulpería para atraer más clientela, de esta manera ir  creciendo cada día más en su negocio. Dentro de sus planes futuros es poder mejorar la calidad de vida familiar para vivir dignamente.
texts.en:
Doña Evelia, age 42, is a humble merchant and a Kiva client. She is the owner of a grocery store. Evelia is very grateful for her first loan because it enabled her to invest in her business by purchasing more fruits, vegetables, and basic grains. This allowed her to increase her earnings.

For this reason, she is now requesting her second loan so that she can buy sodas, sugar, rice, beans, oil, meat, chicken, pineapple, melons, soap, and other products. By acquiring more products for her store, she hopes to attract more customers in order keep her business growing each day. Her future plans include improving her family’s quality of life so that they can live decently.

loans.use: to buy sodas, sugar, rice, beans, oil, meat, chicken, pineapple, melons, soap, and other products.

loans.name: Oygul

texts.ru: Ойгул женщина, которая легко решает все проблемы.  Она считает, что «нет лучшей мудрости чем своевременная мудрость». Она имеет достаточный жизненный опыт, так как она замужем и на воспитании имеет 4 детей.  Она родилась в сельской местности, которое имеет хорошее условие для животноводства и выращивания сельскохозяйственных культур. Она с детства помогала родителям по скотоводству и поэтому она имеет большой опыт по данному бизнесу. Ойгул скот держит за счёт кормов произведённых им самим. На полученный доход от бизнеса Ойгул хочет улучшить условию своего домохозяйства. В прошлом году муж Ойгул приехал из России на определённое время и помогал жене по ведению бизнеса по скотоводству. В настоящее время муж Ойгул опять хочет уехать в Россию на заработки. Он здесь не имеет постоянное место работы, а доход от скотоводства не хватает для проживания. Поэтому Ойгул обращалась  в нашу организацию с целью получения займа для покупки авиабилета для мужа, а сама хочет продолжать бизнес по скотоводству. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 4000 сомони. Ойгул надеется на Вашу благотворительность и милосердие.
texts.en: Oygul is a problem solver. She believes that "there is not better wisdom then the wisdom that comes at the right time". She has had much life experience, as she is married and is raising four children. Oygul was born in a rural area with good conditions for raising livestock and growing crops. Since her childhood she helped her parents take care of cattle and is an experienced rancher. She also grows her own animal feed. Oygul invests profits from her business to improve the living conditions of her family. Last year, Oygul's husband came back from Russia to help with livestock. Now he needs to go back to Russia for work. In Tajikistan he has no regular job and the livestock business does not yield enough money to support all of them. Oygul has turned to Kiva for a loan so she can buy her husband an airplane ticket, while she stays behind and takes care of cattle. She is requesting a loan of 4000 somoni. Oygul hopes for your charity and kindness.

loans.use: to buy an air ticket for her husband who wants to go work in Russia

loans.name: Venus

texts.en:
This is Venus, 35, resident of Malibay, Pasay, Philippines. She is single and works hard to provide income for her everyday needs. Venus also helps her parents and siblings financially. She works as an egg retailer. Basically, Venus buys eggs from wholesalers and then sells them at a little profit. Customers are attracted to her low prices and her regular customers are her neighbors and local community members. Venus earns a minimum of 500 PHP in sales every day.
 
Venus is requesting a 15,000 PHP loan to purchase additional stocks of eggs. She dreams that her business will continue to grow and she hopes to earn a better living. Venus meets up weekly with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work and draw strength and inspiration from studying the Word of God. 

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners who gather to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for eggs

loans.name: Melitona

texts.en:
Melitona is 40 years old and has four children, two of whom are in school. For the past eight years, she has been a vegetable farmer. She has borrowed 11 previous loans from Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. to sustain her business.

Melitona is requesting a 45,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy fertilizer, seedlings, and other farm supplies. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seedlings, and farm supplies

loans.name: Mercedita

texts.en:
Mercedita is 56 years old and married with four children. For the past three years, she has owned and operated a food stall. Mercedita earns approximately 6,000 PHP each month. 

Mercedita is requesting a 16,000 PHP loan to purchase meat and vegetables to cook and sell. In the future, she hopes to grow her business and increase her income.

loans.use: to purchase meat and vegetables to cook and sell

loans.name: Josefina

texts.en:
This is Josefina, 56, resident of Malibay, Pasay, Philippines. She is married to Narciso, a welder, and is a mother to her children. She, together with her husband, manages their own household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for her everyday expenses.

Josefina is a mineral water distributor. What she basically does is buy mineral water in containers from wholesalers and sell them per container (5 gallons per container) with a profit. She also has a sidecar for additional income. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns a minimum of PHP 500 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 15,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy more gallons of mineral water to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.  

Josefina hopes that her business will continue to grow and dreams that she will have more pedicabs. She meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her life and business every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for more gallons of mineral water to expand her product inventory.

loans.name: Peter

texts.ru: Вот уже 30 лет как Петр занимается тепличным хозяйством. На 0,5 гектара земли он выращивает ранние и поздние овощи: помидоры,огурцы, капусту. В В этом году Петр обновляет теплицу. Ему нужно закупить пленку на 8000 грн, дрова для отопления на 3000 грн, сделать реконструкцию теплиц на 7000 грн, а также, удобрения и химикаты на 2000 грн. Сделав все это, Петр сможет получить доход с продажи ранних огурцов,помидоров, пекинской капусты и заработает на нужды семьи и бизнеса.
texts.en: Peter has been farming in greenhouses for more then 30 years. He has a 0.5 hectare/1.2 acre plot of land where he grows early and late season vegetables: tomatoes, cucumbers and cabbage. This year Peter is refurbishing his greenhouse. He needs to buy plastic covers for 8000 grivn, wood for heating for 3000 grivn, perform structural repairs for 7000 grivn and also purchase fertilizer and chemicals for 2000 grivn. After his greenhouse is repaired he will again earn profits from sale of early cucumbers, tomatoes and Chinese cabbage and provide for the needs of his family and business.

loans.use: to prepare his greenhouses for the growing season

loans.name: Muhbira

texts.ru: Человек с тонким вкусом и огромной душой,  которую зовут Мухбира, очень срочно хочет организовать свой бизнес. Ей 47 лет. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Дети совершеннолетние. Ее муж работает шофером и получает маленькую зарплату. Это зарплата не хватает для обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами. Мухбира решила помочь мужу для благо получения семьи. С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Теперь она вполне может организовать свой бизнес и стать успешной в этой сфере. Она хочет организовать бизнес  купле продажей скота, так как имеет опыт в этом виде бизнеса. От полученного дохода она планирует обеспечить своих детей высококалорийными продуктами питания. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1000 сомони для покупки скота, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Muhbira is a woman with taste and a generous soul. She wants to urgently start a new business. Muhbira is 47 years old, married and has three adult children. Her husband works as a driver and earns a small salary. This salary is insufficient to provide their family with all the necessities. Muhbira has decided to help her husband provide for the family. With this goal in mind she took a class "Achieving success" with the Association of Business Women and received her certificate. She wants to organize a livestock feeding business, as she has experience in this area. She plans to use the profits from the business to provide high quality nutrition for her children. Muhbira is requesting a loan of 1000 somoni to purchase cattle so she can start her business. She hopes for your kindness.

loans.use: To buy cattle for organizing a new business

loans.name: Alexander

texts.ru:
Адександр много лет работал на производстве кузнецом. Однако, 10 лет назад предприятие расформировали, Александра сократили. Ему пришлось искать другие варианты заработка.  Александр построил теплицы, начал заниматься фермерством.

Александр выращивает помидоры, огурцы и редис в теплицах на своем участке в селе Знаменка. В этом году решил расшириться и построить дополнительную теплицу; на следующий год хочет сделать отопление в теплицах.

Александр женат, есть две дочери. Жена работает учителем в школе.
texts.en: Alexander used to work as a blacksmith in a factory. However, 10 years ago the factory modernized and Alexander's job was cut. He was forced to find other ways to make a living. Alexander built several greenhouses on his land and started a farm. He grows tomatoes, cucumbers and radishes in the greenhouses on his plot in Znamenka village. This year he decided to expand and to built another greenhouse. Next year he plans to install heating in the greenhouses. Alexander is married and has two daughter. His wife wokrs as a school teacher.

loans.use: to build an additional green house

loans.name: Mertha Sedana Group

texts.en: With 10 members, the Mertha Sedana group continues to get a loan from MUK to expand their businesses. They want success and to develop their family welfare. Ni Ketut is using the loan to buy two more piglets for fattening and feed. Currently, she already has a sow. Cages have been prepared to accommodate the piglets to be born. She has a plan for selling piglets. Her husband was very supportive of her efforts which since have proven to improve the welfare of his family. Ni Ketut hopes her efforts will be growing and successful.

loans.use: To buy 2 fattening piglets and food for them.

loans.name: Corazon

texts.en:
Corazon is 47 years old and married with six children. For the past 21 years, she has earned a living by fattening pigs in the Philippines. Corazon earns additional income from renting computers. 

Corazon is requesting a 30,000 PHP loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. She is working tirelessly toward attaining her dream of saving enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La clienta  vive en Guayaquil. Ella siempre ha tenido una vida de muchas actividades y una de ellas es la de venta de comida, lo comenzo hace 3 años atras. Ella realiza el trabajo sola ya q no puede salir de la casa porque tiene un niño especial quien tiene una discapacidad fisica.

La dificultad de ella es la enfermedad  de su hijo que hace que se le hinche todo el cuerpo. Ella está separada de su esposo. Ella tiene 3 hijos, 2 mayores de edad que ya están casado y el niño que padece del síndrome que tiene 10 años. 

Con el prestamo ella espera comprar legumbres, granos, verduras y asi mejorar sus ingresos y darle una mejor vida a su hijo. Su sueño es tener un restaurante ya que hoy vende comida de manera informal , en lo familiar espera que su hijo mejore su salud.
texts.en:
The client lives in Guayaquil.  She has always had a life full of many business activities, and selling food is one of them.  She started three years ago.  She works alone, because she is not able to leave the house. 

This is because she has a special child who has a physical disability.  Her difficulty is her son’s illness.  It makes his whole body swell.

She is separated from her husband.  She has three children; two of them are adults and already married.  The son who suffers from the syndrome is ten years old.

She plans to use the loan to buy legumes, grains, and vegetables.  This way she will improve her income and be able to give her child a better life.

Her dream is to have a restaurant because her food sales now are informal.  Regarding her family, she hopes that her son’s health improves.

loans.use: to buy legumes, grains, and vegetables.

loans.name: Andres

texts.es:
El señor Andres trabaja como transportista del servicio público (Taxi), su nivel de educación es  primaria, vive en casa propia ocupando 3  habitaciones en un acabado fino  y piso de machimbre.
Andres también tiene una tienda de barrio que la atiende su esposa por más de  8 horas al día, cuyos ingresos le ayudan para cubrir sus gastos de alimentación, luz, agua y otros.

El crédito lo requiere para el aumento de capital de su tienda, comprará insumos como ser, azúcar, arroz, fideo, sodas y otros para ofrecer a sus clientes.

El sueño de Andres es que su negocio crezca.

Es la segunda vez con IMPRO y la primera con Kiva.
texts.en:
Andres works as a taxi driver. He has a primary education and lives in his own home that occupies 3 rooms with a fine finish and stripwood floors.

Andres also has a neighborhood shop that his wife tends for more than 8 hours a day, whose revenues help cover expenses like food, electricity, water and others.

He needs the loan to increase the store's capital; he will buy supplies such as sugar, rice, noodles, sodas, and other products to offer their customers. Andres's dream is to grow his business. This is his second loan with Impro and his first with Kiva.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice, noodles, sodas and other products for the neighborhood store run by his wife.

loans.name: Fernanda

texts.en:
Fernanda is 55 years old and married with four children. For the past four years, she has run a general store in the Philippines where she sells a variety of items such as bread, candies, snack food, and other products. Fernanda works very hard to provide for her family.

Fernanda is requesting a 11,500 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks such as bread, candies, snack foods, and other items to sell in her store. In the future, she would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase bread, candies, snack foods, and other items

loans.name: Long

texts.en:
Long was born in 1983. She has two children who are little. Her husband and she have a grocery store to earn a living. Her husband earns about 5,000,000 VND per month. Long’s income is about 4,000,000 VND. She has done this job for five years. Her family’s total earnings are about 9,000,000 VND per month. 

Long has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2012. In the last cycle, she borrowed 5,014,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 6,322,000 VND to buy noodles, biscuits, snacks and assorted drinks for her grocery store.

loans.use: to buy noodles, biscuits, snacks and assorted drinks for her grocery store.

loans.name: Mien

texts.en:
Mien was born in 1960. She has two daughters and a son who are adults. Her oldest daughter has her own family. Mien’s husband is a carpenter. His income is about 3,500,000 VND. Mien is a farmer to earn a living. She earns about 2,000,000 VND. She has done this job for 20 years. Her family’s total earnings are about 4,500,000 VND per month. 

Mien has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2009. In the last cycle, she borrowed 8,502,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 9,810,000 VND to buy food for her chickens. She always wants to invest more in her farm of chickens and pigs.

loans.use: to buy food for her chickens.

loans.name: Jennelyn

texts.en: Jennelyn is raises hogs in their village. She has been doing this for three years. She is 28 years old and is married with four children. Jennelyn wants to increase the number of piglets she has to raise, but she has inadequate funds. She is asking a loan in the amount of PHP 10,000 to buy additional piglets to raise and feed for them. She hopes to continue grow her business.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets to raise and feed for them.

loans.name: José Adolfo

texts.es:
El señor José Adolfo  vive en un barrio situado  en la parte norte de   Managua, casado, es una persona responsable y trabajadora. Tiene  su propio negocio  se dedica a la venta de productos plásticos, peroles, pailas de aluminio.

 oferta sus productos en los departamento saliendo a las cuatro de la mañana de su casa  y regresando por la noche.
En la casa atiende el negocio su esposa, don José  está solicitando un crédito para la compra de abanicos ,planchas ,licuadora, arroceras ya que son artículos que sus clientes se le están encargando.

Agradece a kiva por los  créditos que se le han otorgado ya que ha crecido su negocio  y con sus ganancias ha mejorado su vivienda.

tiene un excelente cliente, cumplido en sus repago.
texts.en:
